title: I didn't know i have 0 refund left
body: I brought Arcade Riven and Riven and i try them out in a game and i didn't like it why because it feels weird and when I think about it I am kinda angry and stuff saying to my self "I should have buy Lee Sin and his Muay Thai skin" I didn't But, When I go look at my refund Here come the salty part i have 0 refund left and I was angry because I thought I have 2 refund the reason why i brought arcade riven and riven is because I want try them out and see if i like it or not and so that i can refund it if i don't like it. There any way you can help me because i don't spend a lot of money on games that much.  i refund lee sin because he kinda hard to play it change my mind when i saw he have muay thai skin. Sorry for my english is not my first. I hope you Riot can help me because I use to play Dota but i move to lol cause i thought that is fun.

replies.body: Generally, accounts have 3 tokens to correct accidents or mistakes that happen per our [refund ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ)guidelines.  It's not necessarily intended to test run content, where other things like hextech crafting can potentially help with that now.  It's unlikely that we can help with this instance, but we can try!  Without any guarantees, reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our billing team can take a look.  Good luck!
